Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 (Health Unit) -- 3.36 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage Rededication and Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the proceeds of the special tax of the Parish of Tensas, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), authorized for the Tensas Public Health Unit pursuant to an election held on April 29, 2006 and levied in the amount of three and thirty-six hundredths (3.36) mills on the 2014 tax roll (an estimated $194,880 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), hereinbefore collected be rededicated for renovating, maintaining and repairing Parish owned buildings ("Building Purposes") and the tax proceeds hereinafter collected be rededicated to be used to the extent necessary for improving, operating, maintaining and supporting the Tensas Public Health Unit with the remainder to be used for Building Purposes with the authority of the Parish to levy the Tax of three and thirty-six hundredths (3.36) mills to be extended for an additional ten (10) years through the year 2026, said millage to represent a forty-one hundredths of a mill (.41) increase over the 2.95 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on April 29, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 (Library) -- 4.87 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Tensas, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a special tax of four and eighty-seven hundredths (4.87) mills on all property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $282,460 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of support and maintenance of the Tensas Parish Library, said millage to represent a fifty-nine hundredths of a mill (.59) increase over the 4.28 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on April 29, 2006?

Race.SpecificTitle: Lake Bruin Rec. & Water Conservation Dist. -- $10 Parcel Fee Increase - BOC
Race.SummaryText:
Lake Bruin Recreation and Water Conservation District Proposition
(Parcel Fee Increase)
Race.FullText: Shall Lake Bruin Recreation and Water Conservation District (the "District"), be authorized to increase the annual parcel fee of Fifteen Dollars ($15.00) on each lot, subdivided portion of ground or individual tract in the District identified by an individual assessment number on the assessment rolls of Tensas Parish, presently authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on July 19, 2008 to an annual parcel fee of Twenty-Five Dollars ($25.00) commencing with the year 2015 and continuing through the year 2017 (an estimated $20,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the service charge for an entire year), for the purpose of paying the costs of operation of the District, including management and control of water levels and aquatic plant growth within the District and protection and preservation of the works, improvements and properties owned or controlled by the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Gravity Drainage District No. 1 -- 9.96 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Gravity Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of Tensas Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of nine and ninety-six hundredths (9.96) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $51,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for constructing, improving and/or maintaining drainage works in the District, said millage to represent a one and twenty hundredths mills (1.20) increase over the 8.76 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on July 15, 2006?
